name: realtime-service-ts
description: Real-time service rework in TypeScript with Express

scripts.grpc:generate: shx rm -rf src/clients && shx mkdir -p src/clients && grpc_tools_node_protoc --plugin=protoc-gen-ts=./node_modules/.bin/protoc-gen-ts --plugin=protoc-gen-grpc=./node_modules/.bin/grpc_tools_node_protoc_plugin --js_out=import_style=commonjs,binary:./src/grpc --grpc_out=grpc_js:./src/grpc --ts_out=grpc_js:./src/grpc -I ./protos ./protos/*.proto
